text: BOOST Fruit Flavoured Complete Nutrition Wildberry
BOOST Juice Fruit Flavoured Beverage - OrangeBoisson BOOST Fruit Flavoured Beverage - WildberryBOOST Fruit Flavoured Beverage - PeachBOOST Fruit Flavoured Complete Nutrition Wildberry

BOOST Fruit Flavoured Wildberry Complete Nutrition Drink (6 x 237 ml) is a non-creamy formulated liquid diet with 180 calories, 22 vitamins and minerals and 9 g protein (100% whey protein) per 237 ml. Available in a carton with 6 tetras. Use as directed by a healthcare professional. Shake well and serve chilled before drinking.
BOOST Fruit Flavoured Complete Nutrition WildberryFeatures and Benefits
Wildberry-flavoured formulated liquid diet that contains 180 calories, 22 vitamins and minerals and 9 g of protein per 237 ml serving
With 100% whey protein to help build and maintain muscle
Available as a carton of 6 tetras
Serve chilled and shake well before drinking
BOOST Fruit Flavoured Complete Nutrition WildberryNutrition Information

BOOST Fruit Flavoured Complete Nutrition WildberryIngredients

Orange flavour only:Water, liquid sugar, whey protein isolate, phosphoric acid, magnesium gluconate, citric acid, soybean oil, choline bitartrate, natural flavour, calcium chloride, colour, L-cysteine, polyglycerol esters of fatty acids, manganese sulphate, ferrous sulphate (iron), copper gluconate, zinc sulphate, vitamin A palmitate, vitamin D3, DL-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, vitamin K1, ascorbic acid, thiamine hydrochloride, riboflavin, nicotinamide, pyridoxine hydrochloride, folic acid, calcium panothenate (pantothenic acid), cyanocobalamin, biotin.Contains milk and soy.For complete nutritional information or other questions, please call Nestlé Health Science Consumer Services at 1 800 565-1871.
